title: Piccolo OS, a Small Multitasking OS for the Raspberry Pi Pico
dot:
digraph PiccoloOS{rankdir=TB; PiccoloOS[label="Piccolo OS
Small multitasking OS
for Raspberry Pi Pico
Teaching Tool", shape=box];Limitations[label="Limitations
- Lack of per-task memory
- No multicore support
- No mutexes, queues,
  file system, networking,
  shell, etc.", shape=box];Contributing[label="Contributing
Open for contributions
Fork and extend as needed", shape=box];BuildInstructions[label="Build Instructions
- Install Pico C/C++ SDK
- Clone repository
- Run cmake and make", shape=box]; Kernel[label="Kernel
- main() and piccolo_start()
- Manages task switching", shape=box];Task[label="Task
- User-defined function
- Runs in round-robin fashion", shape=box];Stacks[label="Stacks
- Main Stack Pointer (MSP)
- Process Stack Pointer (PSP)
- Context switching mechanism", shape=box]; PiccoloInit[label="piccolo_init()
Initializes tasks", shape=box];CreateTask[label="piccolo_create_task()
Creates and initializes task stack", shape=box];Yield[label="piccolo_yield()
Yields control to the kernel", shape=box];Syscall[label="isr_svcall()
Handles SVC interrupt
Restores kernel state", shape=box]; PiccoloOS->Limitations;PiccoloOS->BuildInstructions;PiccoloOS->Contributing; PiccoloOS->Kernel;Kernel->Task;Kernel->Stacks; Stacks->PiccoloInit;Stacks->CreateTask;Stacks->Yield;Yield->Syscall; TaskExecution[label="Execution Flow
1. Create Task
2. Run Task
3. Yield
4. Switch to next Task", shape=box];Kernel->TaskExecution;}
